bibl.title: Albert H. Young and Kamasaburo Sugiuro v. United States. Order authorizing release of petitioner on bail.
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

msIdentifier.repository: National Archives and Records Administration, Seattle Branch, Washington
msIdentifier.collection: RG 21: US District Court, Western Division of Washington, Seatle

div1.p: In the District Court of the United States, for the Western District of Washington, Northern Division
In the Matter of the Petition of Albert H. Young and Kamasaburo Sugiura, alias B.K. Sugiura, aliens, for a Writ of Habeas Corpus. | #2628 Order Authorizing Release of Petitioner on Bail
Thereupon, upon application of petitioner Kamasaburo Sugiura, alias B.K. Sugiura, it is

Ordered and Adjudged by the Court that he be released and discharged from custody until the further order of the Court, upon his giving a good and sufficient bond in the sum of Five Hundred Dollars ($500.00) approved by the United States Attorney. And the said Commissioner of Immigration is hereby authorized and directed to discharge and release the said petitioner, Sugiura, upon delivery of such bond, approvedas aforesaid.
Done in Open Court this 16th day of December.
div1.ab: O. K. Clay Allen United States Attorney
div1.p: In the District Court of the United States for the Western District of Washington Northern Division BOB-4-348
In the matter of the Petition of Albert H. Young et al, for a Writ of Habeas Corpus.
Order authorizing release of Petitioner on Bail
Filed in the U.S. District Court, Western Dist. of Washington, Northern Division Dec 16 1913 Frank L. Crosby, Clerk, By EML Deputy.
R. W. McClelland, H.A.P. Myers & L. Johnstone Attorney for Petitioners Building
